name: Arr Matey / weather.json
description: Localization strings for the Weather cog (Arr Matey - pirate speak).
author: ScarlxtPink

data.weather.description: Weather related commands an' settings, fer shipmates.
data.weather.set.location.invalid_format.desc: Make sure ye pick a location from the autocomplete suggestions, or ye be lost at sea.
data.weather.set.location.success.title: Yer Weather Location Updated
data.weather.set.location.success.description: Yer weather location be set to **{name}**.
data.weather.error.cooldown: Ye be spamming the helm. Try again in {retry_after} seconds.
data.weather.error.invoke: A storm o' errors blew in. Try again later, matey.
data.weather.set.units.success.title: Yer Weather Settings Updated
data.weather.set.units.success.description: Yer weather units be set to: {units}
data.weather.not_setup: Ye haven't set up yer weather yet. Use `/set weather <location>` to set yer spot on the map.
data.weather.fetch_error: Could not fetch weather data, the sea's bein' temperamental.
data.weather.unavailable: Weather data be unavailable at the moment.
data.weather.embed.title: {icon} Weather Forecast fer {user}'s Location
data.weather.footer: Data provided by Open-Meteo | Powered by Chorus (aye)
